original: Puna caparaṁ, sāriputta, tathāgato anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati, seyyathidaṁ—ekampi
analyzed: puna capara sāriputta tathāgataḥ aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussarati
corrected: puna caparaṁ sāriputta tathāgato aneka vihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati seyyathidaṁ ekampi

original: Yampi, sāriputta, tathāgato anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati, seyyathidaṁ—ekampi
analyzed: yam pi sāriputta tathāgataḥ aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussarati
corrected: yam pi sāriputta tathāgato aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussarati seyyathidam ekam pi

original: Seyyathāpi, sāriputta, aṅgārakāsu sādhikaporisā pūrā aṅgārānaṁ vītaccikānaṁ vītadhūmānaṁ.
analyzed: seyyathā api sāriputta aṅgārakāsu sa adhika porisā pūrāḥ aṅgārānam
corrected: seyyathā api sāriputta aṅgārakāsu sa adhika porisā pūrā aṅgārānaṁ vītaccikānaṁ vītadhūmānaṁ
sāya tatiyakam pi udakorohana anuyogam anuyutto viharāmi

original: Tatrāssu me idaṁ, sāriputta, jegucchismiṁ hoti—
corrected: Tatra assu me idam sāriputta jegucchismim hoti

original: yo koci avītarāgo taṁ vanasaṇḍaṁ pavisati, yebhuyyena lomāni haṁsanti.
analyzed: tam vana saṇḍam pavisati yebhuyyena lomāni hasanti
corrected: yo koci avītarāgo tam vana saṇḍam pavisati yebhuyyena lomāni haṁsanti

analyzed: nūna tena samayena kolaḥ ahosi iti
corrected: mahā nūna tena samayena kolo ahosi iti

original: Seyyathāpi nāma oṭṭhapadaṁ; evamevassu me ānisadaṁ hoti tāyevappāhāratāya.
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma oṭṭhapade evam evassu me ānisadam hoti
corrected: seyyathā api nāma oṭṭhapadaṁ evam evassu me ānisadaṁ hoti tāya eva appāhāratāya

original: So kho ahaṁ, sāriputta, ‘vaccaṁ vā muttaṁ vā karissāmī’ti tattheva avakujjo papatāmi tāyevappāhāratāya.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha sāriputta vaccam vā muttam vā karissāmi iti tattha iva avakujjaḥ papatāmi
corrected: so kho ahaṁ sāriputta vaccaṁ vā muttaṁ vā karissāmi iti tattha eva avakujjo papatāmi tāya eva appāhāratāya

original: Tadāpi etaparamoyeva taṇḍulo ahosi, seyyathāpi etarahi.
analyzed: tadā api taṇḍulaḥ sā iyyathā api etarahi
corrected: tadā api eta paramo yeva taṇḍulo ahosi seyyathā api etarahi

original: Seyyathāpi nāma oṭṭhapadaṁ; evamevassu me ānisadaṁ hoti tāyevappāhāratāya.
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma oṭṭhapade evam evassu me ānisadam hoti
corrected: seyyathā api nāma oṭṭhapadaṁ evam evassu me ānisadaṁ hoti tāya eva appāhāratāya

original: So kho ahaṁ, sāriputta, ‘vaccaṁ vā muttaṁ vā karissāmī’ti tattheva avakujjo papatāmi tāyevappāhāratāya.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha sāriputta vaccam vā muttam vā karissāmi iti tattha iva avakujjaḥ papatāmi
corrected: so kho ahaṁ sāriputta vaccaṁ vā muttaṁ vā karissāmi iti tattha eva avakujjo papatāmi tāya eva appāhāratāya

original: Tāyapi kho ahaṁ, sāriputta, iriyāya tāya paṭipadāya tāya dukkarakārikāya nājjhagamaṁ uttariṁ manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṁ.
analyzed: kho aha sāriputta iriyāya tāya paṭipadāya tāya dukkara kārikāya na ajjhagamam uttarim manussa dhammāḥ
corrected: Tāya pi kho ahaṁ sāriputta iriyāya tāya paṭipadāya tāya dukkara kārikāya na ajjhagamaṁ uttariṁ manussa dhammā alam ariya ñāṇa dassana visesaṁ

original: Attamano āyasmā nāgasamālo bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: āyasmā nāgasamālaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti
corrected: Attamano āyasmā nāgasamālo bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandi iti
